description:
Ramon and Erika escape the Chinese army`s attack on the church graveyard and flee into the complex network of alleyways of Shangai. In order to keep the promise he made to his older brother Kenshiro, Ramon becomes Erika`s "Little Guardian," protecting her from their attackers one after another. However, the giant and beast-like Shamura comes charging towards them. On the main streets, Zi-Ying and Yu-Ling escape the army`s machine gun fire, but they eventually find themselves cornered... Meanwhile, while trying to flee from Kenshiro, Tian Xue-Yun runs into a mysterious figure whose face is hidden beneath the hood of their cloak...
Source: crunchyroll
